title: Korean for Korean Speakers
description: For students who comprehend informal spoken Korean but wish to improve their communicative and sociocultural competence and their analytic understanding. Language functions for oral communication, reading, writing, and media/arts; dialect and language style differences; structure and history of Korean. LIHL 115F, LIHL 115W, and LIHL 115P may be taken in any order. Prerequisites: upper-division standing or consent of instructor; appropriate proficiency for level.
